p: Interactions of five marine natural products have been shown ( Figures 2 and 3). Residues Thr24, Leu27, His41, Phe140, Cys145, His163, Met165, Pro168, and His172 are present in the active site and its surrounding (Wu etÂ al., 2020). The drug C1 shows good binding affinity, forming many hydrogen and hydrophobic interactions. Compound C2 also exhibited interactions with active site of M pro, creating a catalytic dyad, consist of Cys145 and His41, where the cysteine is a nucleophile in the proteolytic process ( Figure 3). The best interacting pose was selected based on E_refine and E_score2. The more negative score shows a good ligand and protein complex ( Table 2).
